events.description: We are looking for an experienced volunteer to help maintain our accounting records. This work can only be performed remotely but there may be a training period in-person. This volunteer would do all of our AP/AR/GL Entries (about 50 per month) and prepare our P&L, Cash Flow, and Balance Sheet. This volunteer would be needed between the 1st of the month and the 2nd Wednesday, when we have out board meeting. This person will be directly interfacing with our leadership team as well as the board of directors. We use QuickBooks and SalesForce software. Come join a fun team!
events.title: Part-time Bookkeeper (Remote)

events.description: CALLING ALL PRAYER WARRIORS: Join the SoupMobile Prayer Team as a Prayer Warrior and help us pray for the homeless & others in need. Every week we will email you the prayer requests we have received, and you pray over them in the privacy of our own home. If you believe in the power of prayer and seek to help your fellowman, then this volunteer opportunity is just for you! This is a wonderful 'VIRTUAL' volunteer opportunity whereby from the privacy of your own home and thru prayer, you can make a real difference in the lives of the less fortunate! Because this is a 'virtual' volunteer opportunity, it doesn't matter if you live in Dallas, New York, San Francisco, Japan, Zimbabwe, Germany, Mexico, Canada, Australia or anywhere else in the world. As long as you have a valid email address, you are good to go! May the Lord bless & keep you. Pastor David Timothy-SoupMobile Church 2423 S. Good Latimer Expy. Dallas,Texas 75215

events.description:
In 2021, in the midst of a global pandemic and economic crisis, RESULTS advocates were part of an historic effort that cut US child poverty in half. By raising our voices, we ensured that our leaders heard the needs of our communities. For decades before this, we’ve mobilized against cuts to vital anti-poverty programs and ensured programs like SNAP, housing assistance, and tax credits that support families facing financial uncertainty are available when people need them.

We invite you to be part of our community of change this year and help continue to make a difference in Texas.

What You’ll Do as an Advocate

With just 4-6 hours per month as a RESULTS volunteer advocate you will:

Take effective advocacy actions with other volunteers in your community, such as communicating with members of Congress and their staff, publishing media, and organizing in your community.
Attend monthly webinars covering policy updates, advocacy training, anti-oppression, as well as other support & tools available for volunteers.
Become a more effective advocate through self-paced advocacy skills training & action taking.
Connect with a community of advocates in Texas and across the U.S.
Call for Solutions to Hunger & Housing Instability

Too many families are forced to make hard choices between paying rent and buying food and other necessities. A growing affordable housing crisis only makes this worse. 1 in 6 children in the US lack the food security to grow, learn, and lead active lives. And due to inaction from Congress, after seeing a dramatic reduction in child poverty in 2021, critical support expired, and child poverty nearly doubled again. We must stand with millions in our country facing hunger, housing insecurity, and economic hardship.

As an advocate this year, you will:

Protect and expand funding for programs that promote health and ensure access to nutritious food.
Secure resources and financial support for stable, affordable housing.
Help put money back in people’s pockets by making our tax code work for households with low-incomes and people experiencing poverty.
As we face uncertainty about what will come next in our country, this is when our advocacy matters the most. Help us ensure that our leaders understand the needs of your community and make decisions that secure the rights of nutrition, housing, and financial stability to all.

Get Started Today

Be part of our unstoppable community of change. Sign up for your 1-hour New Advocate Orientation www.results.org/volunteer
